issue.subject: Add plugin capability in the "resources" view
issue.description:
We have a custom behavior we'd like to implement in the *resource view*.
*Can we add a Joomla plugin capability* in this view, as already present in views like : basket, order, request ?

Ref: pages with plugin:
https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/repository/entry/branches/4.4.x/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_shop/src/administrator/layouts/com_easysdi_shop/order.php
https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/repository/entry/branches/4.4.x/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_shop/src/site/views/basket/view.html.php
https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/repository/entry/branches/4.4.x/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_shop/src/site/helpers/basket_string_parser.php

custom_fields.name: Functional impact
custom_fields.value: Add the ability to customize or change behavior of the "resources" page.

journals.notes:
Accepted by TC.

Yves has to describe the views able to host a plugin in the project documentation.
